name: Color Rush - A Color Catching Game
name_original: Color Rush - A Color Catching Game
description:
It's triangle blast time! The ultimate matching colour triangle game with unique gameplay!
Get addicted to this simple fun game featuring with coloured triangles. Tap the screen to match the triangle colour and crush triangles through rotating cube. An amazing idea to play on your iPad, iPhone or apple watch.
Try to match and crush as many triangles as you can with your triangle catcher!

How to Play
3D Touch
Single Tap to flip vertical triangles
Force tap to rotate all triangles to right/left
Non 3D Touch
Single Tap to flip vertical triangles
Swipe left to rotate all triangles to left and swipe right to rotate all triangles to right

Game Features:
● Apple Watch Version
● 3D touch enabled game play
● Intuitive Controls
● Stunning graphics and unique game play
● Fast paced game
● Easy and fun to play but challenging to master

Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at info@teensystudios.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist. Thank you.
